Replacing "self-taught" with "community-taught" from here on out. It's more accurate, especially given how many amazing resources the #rstats community has built. 

Thanks for sharing this phrasing, @EriPDev!

#Rstats people: What package (CRAN, Github, whatever) is under-appreciated and also incredibly life-changing for you?

For me it‚Äôs Glue. I do a ton of SQL from boilerplate and Glue::glue_sql saves me hours a week.

One non-serious thing I enjoy doing in #rstats is making pixel art. I create a dataframe of the x and y coordinates, code the colors, then plot it with ggplot2. Here's a pacman ghost I made https://t.co/03RQvHfQbX

For experienced users of #rstats, RStudio Cloud is also a handy place to conduct experiments with different versions of R or packages, without the risk of goofing up your main installation. Let someone else run Docker for you üòâ https://t.co/E0vjW0SGKH
